title: Xayah and Rakan Available Now + Launch Promotions!

replies.body: Best champs ever. Wife and I got them and love them. Thanks riot for this. So many date nights we will have from this.

Ok Riot here is how to make a few million....

Bride and groom skins right....tux with tails for him and gown with veil for her to keep the feather wing things....or switch, she kinda wears the pants....

Tango skins

Halloween couples costume(one that's actually good,most are horrible) 

Ugly Holiday sweater skin.

Shakespeare skins doesn't have to be R/J but something like that, maybe from Tempest.

Waiter Xayah and Dessert Chef Rakan, grumpy waitress and flamboyant chef, *couples cooking comments.

Classic buddy cop duo, add 80s movie dialog.

Gym Buddy skins, Really want this one. 'Crossfit' Xayah, never shuts up about 'crossfit'. Workout video Rakan, cheers you on to work out but barely breaks a sweat. Duo tp is a pushup contest.

Also add VO for the lines, "Iloveyou/Iknow" and wife wants Rakan to say "As you wish."


Also unrelated but a  Grass skirt/Taliyah pool party skin where she rides a surfboard/skimboard and throws seashells/coral.


Riot I release all claim to these ideas, just make it happen.
Maybe even a Yin and Yang skin for them, that'd be cool.
I second this

I love everything about this comment! Maybe for Halloween, they could do Skeleton Bride Xayah and Skeleton Groom Rakan. Have them like mostly bones with their feathers all torn up and ragged looking and change the particle effect for Rakan's charm and make it kind of like a 'fear' animation with little ghosts or something just for that skin. I'd buy it in a second!

And on the Pool Party idea, they should also do a Pool Party Illaoi. Why doesn't that skin already exist for her?! She's like a sea goddess with tentacles...I mean come on, missed opportunity! Her tentacles could be pool noodles or exaggerated cartoony blue octopus tentacles, that ball she holds could be a beach ball. Have her dressed in a one piece bathing suit with Hawaiian patterned swim shorts on with a visor hat on. It's kinda butch, but it works for her.
throw in a netflix and chill skin and an old aging couple skin that gives each other a lot of crap (but still very much in love) for realism haha.
Reading through the comments and then {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} It is the comment that defines everything
for halloween: salt and pepper shakers.
and the less used but equally tasty Cumin?
Shut up Ted, Marshmellow and Lilypad dont love you
okay Ted
{{champion:497}}  Forgot Heartseeker skins  {{champion:498}}  Rakan brings them in, Xayah takes them out
I would love to see Arcade skins for them. The classic Player 1 and Player 2. Xayah would def be Player 1.
Noo why didn't I think of that. I kept trying to come up with an arcade idea but I was stuck. Need this to get upvoted more. Does riot read these ideas? Cactopus are you there?

same thing me and my husband did! 
funny thing is i main ADC, so i get xayah-the female and he is the support, works out great!
My boyfriend and I have them, he main's adc I main support. Even though its a genderbend, our personalities better match the champ in our role so it still works.

So much fun!!! I love playing with Ham/Husbeared(only reason to play LOL) and now it just got better:)

Their commentary is so fun and enjoyable!
I'd like to report a bug in your gifting system... I dont have any friends.

Would be funny to see them dress up as Lamb and Wolf {{champion:203}} 

Rakan as Wolf dashing around as Xayah throws her projectiles like Lamb's arrows
"Definitely Not Xayah and Rakan"
yes. just. yes.
I want them to have lines mocking Kindred and when they do it triggers Lamb's "Are you imitating me?" line
or the reverse, kindred could get a xa/ra skin too... some love for them maybe?
Special thanks to Riot for releasing these champs as they will take 2 slots in the banning phase and we will finally be able to play Yasuo.
No no no, see we get ten bans coming soon and yasuo will forever be buried out back{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Sooooo true XD
no worries. we will just ban whomever we think is the more annoying of the two and pretend yasuo is his long lost lover.

Says bundle is 3375 but in game shows as 3675.
Glitch or what?
Whoops, that was totally our bad. It's not a glitch and the price should be 3675. Page has been updated, sorry about that!
If I were to gift a xayah dawn bundle would I still get the gift of magic icon or do I have to gift the champ only?
Can't gift bundles :v
Yes, this! Gonna wait and see if this is a glitch, 300RP is another chest or a champ on sale.
I'm assuming I haven't gotten the icon yet because my friend hasn't accepted the gift yet?

Hey everyone, if you haven't received the icon yet don't worry. Like the post said, it could take up to two weeks. In all likelihood it should be within a couple days, but it won't be instantaneous :)
My husband and I love these champs! He plays Xayah (the girl) and I play Rakan (the boy).  It is so much fun to interact more than we normally do in game.  Thanks riot!
Anyone wanna gift each other? I got over 6300 IP to spare and want Rakan. Same IGN as my username here :)
I want Xayah, so yeah let's gift swap. I'm still saving the IP though, if you can wait 2-3 days.
i think you have to wait 2 weeks lol. unless you already on friends list

The "friendship age" threshold was changed:
> The player receiving a gift needs to have been on your buddy list for at least one day

IF you have all champs excpet the new ones.

GOTO STORE,
ACCESSORIES, then do the steps

1. 1700IP purchase 3 on mystery chards. 
2. Reroll into permanent champ.
3. You will get the champ that you dont own.
4. repeat for the other champion!

only cost 5100 ip instead of 6300.  

Please note! Only works if you have all champs EXCEPT THE NEW CHAMPS. 


http://www.twitch.tv/spaz08
Only GUARANTEED if you have all the camps, I just did this and got Xayah.
Is the ip gifting limited time as well, or is it just the icons?
Both are limited time!

Riot, hats off to oyu guys, these 2 champs are amazing. Especially Rakan who is going to be my main! Hes the first champ that ive played that i truly felt i could main. And i beg that you dont nerf him cuz hes sitting in a beautiful spot, not weak but not over tuned either. +1 Rito, or should i say +2

i get the same thing, i tried over 50 people in my friends list to gift any of them and they all get the same message

"Your friend's gift pool is not large enough to receive a mystery gift."
make sure your friend that is receiving the gift has updated their client. <3
THIS is a BULLSHIT SCAM, gifted two(2) sets of Xayah & Rakan to friends and get no unique summoner icon...DO NOT FALL FOR RIOTS SHIT SCAM!
It doesn't come right after, it can take a few days to two weeks. It says in the post as well.
